column3: Solitude is creativity's best friend, and solitude is refreshment for our souls.
You'll live. Only the best get killed.
Nobody who ever gave his best regretted it.
Living well is the best revenge.
The best time for you to hold your tongue is the time you feel you must say something or bust.
Look your best - who said love is blind?
The best mirror is an old friend.
Grow old with me! The best is yet to be.
I always prefer to believe the best of everybody, it saves so much trouble.
I am easily satisfied with the very best.
The best way to impress a woman is to be the most honest you can.

Nobody's life is a bed of roses. We all have crosses to bear, and we all just do our best. I would never claim to have the worst situation. There are many widows, and many people dying of AIDS, many people killed in Lebanon, people starving all over the planet. So we have to count our lucky stars.
The best protection any woman can have... is courage.
It's my firm conviction that when Uncle Sam calls, by God we go, and we do the best that we can.

Never die easy. Why run out of bounds and die easy? Make that linebacker pay. It carries into all facets of your life. It's okay to lose, to die, but don't die without trying, without giving it your best.
Life is an unfoldment, and the further we travel the more truth we can comprehend. To understand the things that are at our door is the best preparation for understanding those that lie beyond.
By making college unaffordable and student loans unbearable, we risk deterring our best and brightest from pursuing higher education and securing a good-paying job.
What I do say is that I can write verse, and that the writing of verse in strict form is the best possible training for writing good prose.
In general we are least aware of what our minds do best.
There's a victory, and defeat; the first and best of victories, the lowest and worst of defeats which each man gains or sustains at the hands not of another, but of himself.
Honesty is the best policy - when there is money in it.
The best scientist is open to experience and begins with romance - the idea that anything is possible.
I was raised to believe that excellence is the best deterrent to racism or sexism. And that's how I operate my life.
One accusation you can't throw at me is that I've always done my best.
Patience is the best remedy for every trouble.
Love is a sickness full of woes, All remedies refusing; A plant that with most cutting grows, Most barren with best using.
